subject: Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The death of Joe Paterno could weaken the state’s prosecution of two former university officials who have been charged in connection with the child sexual abuse case involving Jerry Sandusky.
snippet: The death of Joe Paterno could weaken the state’s prosecution of two former university officials who have been charged in connection with the child sexual abuse case involving Jerry Sandusky.
